## IResult.orThrow() method

Gets the value associated with a successful [result](./ts-utils.iresult.md)<!-- -->, or throws the error message if the corresponding operation failed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
orThrow(cb: ErrorFormatter): T;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

cb


</td><td>

[ErrorFormatter](./ts-utils.errorformatter.md)


</td><td>

The [error formatter](./ts-utils.errorformatter.md) to be called in the event of failure.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T

The return value, if the operation was successful.

## Exceptions

The error message if the operation failed.
